              int xFrames,
              int yFrames,
              float frameInterval)
        Constructs a new animated sprite.
        Parameters:
        image - sprite sheet
        xFrames - number of frames in image along x-axis
        yFrames - number of frames in image along y-axis
        frameInterval - seconds between frame changes

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Changes to the next frame, if enough time has elapsed.
        Parameters:
        dt - seconds elapsed since previous invocation of this method

        Returns:
        true if update(float) is disabled

      • stop

        public void stop(boolean stopped,
                 boolean reset)
        Parameters:
        stopped - true disables update(float), false enables
        reset - if true, sets the current frame to 0
